data.meta_description:
We are delighted to welcome Paul Haarhuis back to Hazlewood Castle for Berry's Tennis 2024!

Learn more about this stellar player below üëá

üëâPaul turned pro‚Ä¶
data.text:
SOQ (Source Of Quality), joined us at Berry's Tennis Event! An 'on-the-go' gummy brand, their mind & body collection aims to cover all aspects of wellness from skin to sleep, gut health to mind and body nourishment, helping to unlock your true potential & feel amazing every day. Pictured is tennis professional Miles Bugby posing with his new gummies! ü§ç If you are interested in finding out more about SOQ, follow this link to their website: https://www.soqsupps.com #supportingsmallbusiness #corporatehospitality #sponsorshipstalls #berrystennis24

Berry's Tennis Event Behind The Scenes üëè So much hard work from our staff at Hazlewood Castle goes into making our events run smoothly. Details such as food and drink preparations, events management checklists, DJ setups, repair and maintenance, and table decor (to name a few) are thought through before an event. It takes a dedicated team to create success at a large event like Berry's Tennis Event. So, let's give those working behind the scenes some appreciation. #teamwork #hospitalitymanagement #eventmanagement #tennisevent #corporatehospitality

Our newest venture at Hazlewood Castle & Spa, The Secret Forest, officially opens for the school summer holidays tomorrow. üëè A children's adventure trail through the woodlands at Hazlewood Castle, the trail explore the 'Myths of Hazlewood' through an interactive children's experience. From musical instruments to climbing frames, we hope that the forest allows children's imagination to grow as they discover new stories. So far, The Secret Forest has been open on weekends, and has been a success with some great reviews. We hope that The Secret Forest grows from strength to strength in the summer months, and hopefully we see some good weather too! #childrensplay #interactiveplayareas #childrensadventures #thingstodoyorkshire

Berry's Tennis Event silent auction. ü§´ At Berry's tennis this year, we set the goal to raise money for Martin House Children's Hospice, and we did so through a silent auction. We would like to thank all those who participated in this auction and Impulse Decisions for handling the event.

The finest hospitality at Hazlewood Castle for Berry's Tennis Event. Our amazing staff delivered top-quality food for the event, from afternoon tea to a two-course meal. Of course, this isn't a one-off, we always strive to create the best meals possible, whatever the event. Find out more about our dining experiences at https://lnkd.in/eCdkjtP7

Last week, we hosted Berry's Tennis Event at Hazlewood Castle, and it did not disappoint! ü•Çüéæ 3 days of corporate hospitality, tennis matches, networking and more! To top it off, the sun was shining throughout. Throughout the three days, we raised funds for Martin House Children's Hospice, and their newest venture THE BUILD, in which the charity is building a new hospice in Yorkshire. It was great to see so many of our guests donating, and we thank you for this. Berry's Tennis is a one-of-a-kind corporate hospitality event, and we hope all our guests enjoyed the event as much as we enjoyed hosting it. We have collated some pictures of the best moments from the 3 days below. Interested in finding out more about Berry's Tennis? Visit our website at https://lnkd.in/d58Ge-TS #corporatehospitality #networking #networkingyorkshire #tennisevent
